css_templates.name: Happy / Joyful
css_templates.description: A bright and playful template featuring warm hues like yellow and orange. It uses a casual, fun font to evoke feelings of happiness, optimism, and cheerfulnessâ€”perfect for lighthearted, energetic sites.

css_templates.name: Sad / Melancholic
css_templates.description: A reflective, subdued template characterized by cool tones such as deep blues and grays. It employs classic serif fonts to create a calm, introspective, and sometimes somber atmosphere, ideal for thoughtful, emotional content.

css_templates.name: Energetic / Excited
css_templates.description: A dynamic template with bold, vivid colors like red and orange, complemented by subtle animations (e.g., a pulsing effect on headings). This design is intended to convey high energy, excitement, and action, making it great for lively, engaging websites.

css_templates.name: Calm / Serene
css_templates.description: A soothing template that uses gentle pastels and clean, modern typography (like Helvetica Neue). Its soft gradients and minimalist style create a peaceful and relaxed vibe, perfect for websites that aim to promote tranquility and balance.

css_templates.name: Mysterious / Dark
css_templates.description: A dramatic and intriguing template featuring deep, rich hues such as navy and dark blues, paired with a monospaced font. This design creates a sense of enigma and allure, ideal for websites with a bold, mysterious character.
